startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of Facebook Ads Archive URLs to crawl. Each URL should be in the format: https://www.facebook.com/ads/archive/render_ad/?id=XXXXXXXXX&access_token=XXXXX

requestTimeout.description: Timeout for each request in milliseconds.
